content.question:
Reaction 1: 

<math alttext="2 O 3 gas reacts to produce 3 O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.250em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.250em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 

Reaction 2: 

<math alttext="question mark" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>?</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 

Overall reaction: 

<math alttext="2 O 3 gas plus 2 N O gas react to produce 2 N O 2 gas plus 2 O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.250em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 

The enthalpy of the overall reaction represented above can be determined by adding the enthalpies of reactions 1 and 2. Which of the following could be reaction 2 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="N O gas plus O gas react to produce N O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mtext> </mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, N O, close parenthesis, sub 2, gas reacts to produce 2 N O gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>(NO)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 N O gas plus O 2 gas react to produce 2 N O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 N O 2 gas plus O 3 gas react to produce N 2 O 5 gas plus O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 N O gas plus O 2 gas react to produce 2 N O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.A: Identify quantities needed to solve a problem from given information (e.g., text, mathematical expressions, graphs, or tables).
